cause.description:
The goal this year is to raise $10,000.00 to benefit "For the Fallen" We plan to achieve our fund raising goal through event sponsorships, donations, participant registrations, event merchandise and raffle ticket sales. Stangs of South Florida will donate 100% of the proceeds (after expenses) to this Charity
1. Stangs of South Floida, our members raise awareness and show their support for the families of the 3,000 innocent people that lost
cause.mission: Provide funds for familes who lost loved ones during that tragic day and those who fight and secure our freedom.
cause.name: 9/11 Patriot Run
